contentrichtext.text: '''Oliver Brown''' or '''Ollie Brown''' may refer to: *[[Oliver Brown (civil rights)]], plaintiff in the case ''Brown v. Board of Education'' *[[Oliver Brown (baseball)]] (1849–1932), 19th century baseball player *[[Oliver Brown (footballer)]] (1908–1953), English footballer, also known as Buster Brown, active in the 1930s *[[Ollie Brown (baseball)]], Major League Baseball player, born in 1944 *[[Ollie E. Brown]], American drummer and record producer, half of duo Ollie & Jerry *Oliver Brown, son of [[John Brown (abolitionist)]] {{hndis|Brown, Oliver}}
